name: Koala Kids Golf
description:
In Koala Kids Golf you are the ball!
Collect treasure before your opponents. Watch out for traps and dangers or you'll lose your gems!
Compete with Friends or play Challenges to unlock Stars and Customizables.
There are also Platinum Star Achievements that will truly test your Golfing skills!

Key Features:

  • Up to 4 Players Local or Online
  • Challenges!
  • Handcrafted Levels
  • Loads of Customization
  • Cozy Soundtrack!

Challenge Types:

  • Score Attack: Get as much score as possible in 8 turns
  • One Shot Wonder: Only got one shot!
  • Combo Wombo: String together the sickest Combo
  • Boost Run: Never stop that momentum

Can you become the very best aerodynamic Koala? See you out in the fields smoothbrain!


ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ ♡
